website_summaries.verdict: Reasonably priced all-around laptop that provides a quad core processor.
pros: Ships with a high-end Intel quad-core processor
Graphics card works well for both movie playback and for gaming
16 GB of RAM should meet the needs of many users

customer_reviews.title: Bad display viewing angles and short battery life
customer_reviews.text: Specs: - i7 7700 - 16gb - 1060 3gb - 256gb m2 ssd (not nvme) Pros: - Fast - Light compared to my 4 year old laptop with comparable (for its time) specs - Solid keyboard Cons: - Terrible screen viewing angles. This is not an IPS screen, though it never claims to be one. - Short battery life of ~3 hours when just web surfing - Huge track pad causes bad wrist angles for typing - Did not come with a nvme ssd Tip: Use Windows 10's Fresh Start feature to reinstall Windows without the bloatware.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: FAST, Affordable gaming laptop with all the works
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this laptop for about a month now and I’m still overwhelmed on how nice of a brand this is. I haven’t purchased a laptop in years so I took a lot of time to research on a brand and msi was it. This computer in my opinion has everything. Especially the cd drive since those are being phased out. All my games work perfect if not better than before! Love the RGB keyboard and the light up logo in the back. 1 thing though, this laptop is a smudge magnet. That is the only negative thing I can say. Best warranty
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Black

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY COMMON MANUFACTURING ERROR! DO NOT BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had the laptop for little over a year and an extremely common error occurs with a lot of their products. The c,r,8,9,0 and backspace keys stop working unless you put pressure on a spot right to the right of the mouse pad. Didn't drop or spill anything on the laptop just a faulty product. Support ignores the multitude of complaints on forums listing this exact problem. Called customer service and they told me I need to get a replacement keyboard for $300-$400 despite that it is a manufacturing issue. The laptop is extremely prone to this issue more likely than not it will happen down the line. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! Can't stress that enough!
customer_reviews.author: Mary from MA

customer_reviews.title: GO - and as far as CS is concerned I'm playing at max settings and this thing is great for it
customer_reviews.text: I mainly just play CS:GO - and as far as CS is concerned I'm playing at max settings and this thing is great for it. Compared to the last MSI laptop I bought this thing stays pretty cool even after playing for a while.
customer_reviews.author: bingo bango bongo

customer_reviews.title: Don't Listen to Naysayers About Display
customer_reviews.text: Don't listen to naysayers. Screen is perfectly fine for its price and hardware is just insane, runs anything so smoothly. Build quality is great, battery is great and it's a joy to use it. If you want something with better display, you have to pay around 2000 USD. This is the best laptop for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Burak Eren

customer_reviews.title: Holy POWER
customer_reviews.text: Amazing laptop with amazing performance! I've ended up downloading everything to the D drive, which I highly recommend. Beautiful screen, great keyboard, runs games nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gaming and Much More!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent computer with smooth keyboard and touchpad sensitivity. A bit on the larger side but you should know that already before even buying it. The hardware is efficient and performs incredibly! Has some cool flashes and lights as well - like LED keyboard and quiet hardware - that just make the all-around MSI experience with the GP72 7DRX Leopard worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good laptop with nice aesthetics
customer_reviews.text: it's a great laptop, I've been using it for about a month and it does everything it's supposed to but if you're looking for heavy gaming, I wouldn't suggest it, this laptop heats up pretty quick with potato graphics on heavy games
customer_reviews.author: miskit

customer_reviews.title: Best for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Im going to make this review quick. Great all around specs for gaming. Battery life is not great, I stay mostly plugged in anyway. FPS is high for most of the games I play. No problems even after a year of use. Fan noise is a little high though. Other than that great gaming laptop.
customer_reviews.author: yousef attallah

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: I had concerns about getting a mid-priced computer that wouldn't hold up running a Pro Tools type recording software but this thing blows right past it. Zero latency issues. Block size options are top notch. Great choice!
customer_reviews.author: donna a.

customer_reviews.title: It'll do
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine, but the fans are very noisy, and the space bar has to be hit VERY hard to make spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence E. Rosenman

customer_reviews.title: Works well except the USB C connector is intermittent. ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well except the USB C connector is intermittent. I have a hard drive attached and if I move the cable or even touch it the connection is lost. I even replaced the cable with a new one and still have the same problem. Didn't notice it until I spent two days loading software so I'm not sending it back. Other than that, it is working as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Don M.

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard issues and freezing
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice machine either then the fact that I only had a for 30 days and the keyboard It was a nice machine either then the fact that I only had a for 30 days and the keyboard when out on me went out on me, and it froze and i lost all my work and had to reinstall windows.
customer_reviews.author: Kai Lamont

customer_reviews.title: It was what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have had it 2 years and very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Rigsby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quick computer. everything just works. No problems after 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Ford

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, no problems. This laptop plays high end games ln high graphics smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Wes S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An outstanding buy for a laptop. Very fast and looks incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price on amazon
customer_reviews.text: Great speed good color definition. Bad thing is no CD Rom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Display reminds of age old laptops
customer_reviews.text: 1. Good speed, 2. Does not heat much 3. Doesn't feel like 4k display. Bad display viewing angles. 4. Worst audio quality 5. Not sturdy monitor. Feels like it might get damaged every time I open it. Base is very very sturdy in comparison. Missing the balance
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: needs dvd writer, every thimg else is great
customer_reviews.text: you need to offer one with a DVD writer! but love what it does have, card reader is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: bleedingace

customer_reviews.title: Space bar only has one sensor. Essential for heavy usage
customer_reviews.text: The space bar on the laptop is a huge issue especially when you use the laptop quite often. It only has one sensor in the middle. It's likely as time goes by the edges of the space bar would not work. For my laptop I got the sides of the space bar would sometimes not register my push. It is really irritating so I would not recommend using or buying this laptop for gaming or heavy use. I'm really dissapointed since it was quite annoying and one of the core parts of gaming was built poorly
customer_reviews.author: Ye

customer_reviews.title: I just used it for a month, and now ...
customer_reviews.text: I just used it for a month, and now it is not working well. After I turn my computer on for 2-3 hours, it just stops working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The computer itself is very nice as a desktop replacement
customer_reviews.text: The computer itself is very nice as a desktop replacement, however, trying to gain access to MSI for support is terrible. I will not purchase another product from MSI with this kind of service.
customer_reviews.author: Eeyoreprime

customer_reviews.title: I love it and I like it very much from the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it and I like it very much from the bottom of my Heart.Thanks Amazon it is very expensive more than other Official website.Thanks. again To my Favorite company Amazon.i sent my cousin he like that product.Thanks to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Khan Family

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: its a good laptop but it has an hour of battery life, you might as well just buy a computer.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Worth to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding performance with Core i7-7700 processor + GTX 1060 graphics.Love the aluminum case design with full-color RGB keyboard. Thinner and lighter than most models in the market. For its price, it deserves even more than 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Icy Wu

product_meta.title: MSI GP62MVRX Leopard Pro-661 15.6" 94%NTSC Thin and Light Gaming Laptop GTX 1060 3G Core i7-7700HQ 16GB 256GB NVMe SSD + 1TB Full Color Keyboard
product_meta.description:
Capacity:15.6"| Style:GTX 1060 3G | 256GB NVMe + 1TB

NOW WITH FULL RGB KEYBOARD
Utilize the Steel Series engine to light up your keys with a full array of RGB colors to further enchance your gaming experience.


7TH GENERATION INTEL CORE i7 PROCESSOR
The perfect combination of MSI gaming laptops with 7TH GENERATION INTEL CORE i7 PROCESSOR will give up to 10% better performance for a smoother VR experience. The 7th generation Intel Core H series processor utilizes a power-efficient microarchitecture, advanced process technologies, and silicon optimizations to deliver faster performance over previous generations.


THE POWER OF GEFORCE GTX 10-SERIES GRAPHICS
MSI is the world’s 1st gaming laptop powered by GeForce GTX 10 series GPU delivering increased performance over the previous 900M series. With new technologies in Cooler Boost, you can game harder and never worry about being throttled.


WIDE VIEW 94% NTSC PANEL
The 94% NTSC Panel delivers higher color range, presenting clear viewing from either sides of the screen.


NAHIMIC 2 VIRTUAL SURROUND SOUND MILITARY TECHNOLOGY FOR GAMERS
Nahimic 2 specializes in 3D sound enhancement processing and audio emprovements offering virtual 7.1 surround sound in immersive HD. With the all new Sound Tracker feature, gamers will be able to see with an on screen indicator where the sound is originating from. Nahimic will highlight crucial sounds while reducing external noise for an immersive gaming experience.


COOLER BOOST 4- ENHANCED COOLING FOR VR LEVEL GAMING
Crush the heat with the updated Cooler Boost 4. Dedicated thermal solutions for both the CPU and GPU with a total of 6 heat pipes ensure maximum performance under extreme gaming.


CUSTOMIZABLE STEEL SERIES KEYBOARD
Every hardware detail of this keyboard is calculated and especially designed for professional gamers’ needs. Better responsive and tactile feedback, optimum WASD zone and support of multi-key inputs are all for gamers to gain full command over gaming missions.
feature_bullets: Display: 15.6" Full HD eDP Vivid Color 94% NTSC | Resolution: 1920x1080 16:9
Processor: Core i7-7700HQ 2.8 - 3.8 Ghz | Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3G GDDR5
RAM: 16GB (16Gx1) DDR4 2400MHz | Hard Drive: 256GB NVMe SSD + 1TB (7200RPM)
Special features: Full Color RGB Steel Series Keyboard | Nahimic 2 Surround Sound Audio Enhancer | True Color SRGB | Cooler Boost 4 | VR Ready
